attributes.action: I propose that the UK removes the mensturating tax
attributes.additional_details: As a woman you have no choice as to when or if you are to mensturate. How is it fair to be charged an obscene amount for something you do not wish upon you but is infact a cause of nature? As a woman this is not a choice it is a way of life and one should respect this.
attributes.background: I propose that the UK are to consider removing the tax which has been unjustly added to women's mensturating products. It is not a just cause to tax a person who has no control over a general functioning need.
